job.title: Firmware Engineer - Embedded C, Cloud, Wearables, IoT
job.description: If you are a Firmware Engineer with experience please read onbrbrWith locations around the world we are a fastgrowing developer and manufacturer of medical devices We are seeking an experienced Firmware Engineer with C programming skills who ideally has worked with embedded systemsfirmware for wearable devices collecting realtime data As a Senior Engineer youll be responsible for product ownership and have a great deal of say and autonomy with system architecture including design development and implementationbrbrEmployee development career growth and employee autonomy are all important aspects of our company culture Your input is valuable encouraged and celebrated If this is you please apply todaybrbrTop Reasons to Work with Usbrulli Firm dedicated to employee development and growthlili Opportunity to develop products that save liveslili Competitive base salary benefits and excellent company culturebrliulWhat You Will Be Doingbrulli Developing embedded systemsfirmware for medical devices measuring realtime datalili Working with embedded systems that integrate with cloud infrastructurelili Design develop and implement prototype systems for RampDlili CC algorithm development signal processing encryption compressionlili Maintain firmware libraries for hardwarebrliulWhat You Need for this Positionbrulli 5 years of embedded systemsfirmware development experience using C programminglili Recent product development experience for embedded systems that integrate with cloud infrastructure for realtime data collectiontransfer IoTlili C developmentlili ARM Processorslili Signal Processinglili Communication Protocols USB I2C SPIlili Custom driver development and implementation sensors actuators ASICs DACs etclili Selfstarter with a passion for product development and ownershiplili Bachelors Degree in Computer Science Electrical Engineering or relevant experiencebrliulWhats In It for YoubrbrstronguBenefitsbrbrustrongFor your hard work and dedication
